short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your ChatGPT conversations effortlessly. Drag and drop chats into color-coded folders. Perfect for managing your projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you struggle with keeping track of your ChatGPT chats?

Organize your ChatGPT conversations effortlessly today. With AiEnhancer you can easily create color coded folders and drag and drop your chats for easy sorting.

Features:
- Folders
    - Color coded (Premium feature)
- Tags for chats (Coming soon)
- Customizable folder design (Coming soon)
